sentences.en: After the depressing events of the last few months, Mina felt that it was time to put a little joie de vivre back into their lives.
sentences.cn: 经历了前几个月许多令人沮丧的事情, 麦娜觉得现在该小小地享受一下生活了.

sentences.en: Alice Munro has a reputation for being a very depressing writer.
sentences.cn: 艾丽斯·芒罗以文风沉郁闻名。

sentences.en: I have a letter from Sister Yun in which is horribly depressing.
sentences.cn: 今天接到蕴姊从上海来的信,更把我引到百无可望的境地.

sentences.en: It must be really depressing listening to everybody's whinges.
sentences.cn: 听每个人的抱怨肯定非常地郁闷。

sentences.en: It says much for Brookner's skill that the book is sad, but never depressing.
sentences.cn: 这本书笔调忧伤，却并不令人沮丧，这很能说明布鲁克纳超群的写作技巧。
这是个令人沮丧的想法。

sentences.en: The effect of all this was not wholy depressing.
sentences.cn: 这一切事情的结果并不完全令人沮丧.

sentences.en: The most headless passer - by feels the depressing influences of a place.
sentences.cn: 一到这个地方,连最没心事的人也会象所有的 过路人 一样无端端的不快活.

sentences.en: The one ray of sunlight in this depressing history is her meeting and falling in love with Martin.
sentences.cn: 在这段阴郁的时期，遇到并爱上马丁成为她唯一的一丝慰藉。

sentences.en: The report, called "Child Poverty and Deprivation in the UK", makes for depressing reading.
sentences.cn: 题为“英国儿童的贫困状况”的报告让人读起来心情沉重。

sentences.en: The rest of the day's activities often seemed drab or depressing.
sentences.cn: 一天的剩余时光好像常常是乏味或令人沮丧的。

sentences.en: The rest of the day'sactivities often seemed drab or depressing.
sentences.cn: 一天的剩余时光好像常常是乏味或令人沮丧的。

sentences.en: The whole experience was very depressing.
sentences.cn: 整个经历非常令人沮丧。

sentences.en: They all talk with the same depressing harsh arid tongue.
sentences.cn: 说起话来都是一样干巴,一样的生硬,叫人听得好扫兴.
昨天的失业数字令人沮丧。

words.tran_cn: 抑压者；抑压物；压板；降肌
使沮丧；使萧条（depress的过去式和过去分词形式）；压低

trans.tran_cn: 令人忧愁的，使人沮丧的，使情绪低落的
压下( depress的现在分词)，使愁苦，降低（价格），使跌价
